code: public static JavaPairRDD<Object, BSONObject> mongoRdd(JavaSparkContext sparkContext, String mongoHost, long mongoPort, String db, String collection) {     Configuration mongodbConfig = new Configuration().     mongodbConfig.set("mongo.job.input.format", "com.mongodb.hadoop.MongoInputFormat").     mongodbConfig.set("mongo.input.uri", String.format("mongodb://%s:%d/%s.%s", mongoHost, mongoPort, db, collection)).     return sparkContext.newAPIHadoopRDD(mongodbConfig, MongoInputFormat.class, Object.class, BSONObject.class). }
